segment.source: How to use the Package Type Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to pick the media type you’ll use to distribute your custom package.
segment.target: How to use the Package Type Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to pick the media type you’ll use to distribute your custom package.

segment.source: Use the Package Type Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Package Type Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Package Type Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Package Type Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Package Type Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you pick which type of media you’ll use to distribute your custom installation package.
segment.target: The Package Type Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you pick which type of media you’ll use to distribute your custom installation package.

segment.source: You can pick more than one type, if you need it.
segment.target: You can pick more than one type, if you need it.

segment.source: You can't create a full installation package for deployment to Windows 10 computers.
segment.target: You can't create a full installation package for deployment to Windows 10 computers.

segment.source: That option only works for computers running Windows 7 or Windows 8.1.
segment.target: That option only works for computers running Windows 7 or Windows 8.1.

segment.source: To use the File Locations page
segment.target: To use the File Locations page

segment.source: Check the Full Installation Package box if you’re going to build your package on, or move your package to, a local area network (LAN).
segment.target: Check the Full Installation Package box if you’re going to build your package on, or move your package to, a local area network (LAN).

segment.source: This media package includes the Internet Explorer 11 installation files, and is named IE11-Setup-Full.exe, in the folder.
segment.target: This media package includes the Internet Explorer 11 installation files, and is named IE11-Setup-Full.exe, in the folder.

segment.source: Check the Configuration-only package box if you want to update an existing installation of IE11.
segment.target: Check the Configuration-only package box if you want to update an existing installation of IE11.

segment.source: This media package is named IE11- Setup-Branding.exe, in the folder.
segment.target: This media package is named IE11- Setup-Branding.exe, in the folder.

segment.source: You can distribute this file on any media format or server.
segment.target: You can distribute this file on any media format or server.

segment.source: It customizes the IE11 features without re-installing IE.
segment.target: It customizes the IE11 features without re-installing IE.

segment.source: You can’t include custom components in a configuration-only package.
segment.target: You can’t include custom components in a configuration-only package.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Feature Selection page or Back to go to the Language Selection page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Feature Selection page or Back to go to the Language Selection page.
